LanguageData.JRWApatosaurus.label: Apatosaurus
LanguageData.JRWApatosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #01829-1887 [APATOSAURUS AJAX] CODENAME: TITAN >71
A well-known sauropod with no real distinguishing features. It is large and hardy, even more so when travelling in herds.
